mapper.insert: INSERT INTO remittance_status_history (request_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount, status, created_at) VALUES (#{requestId}, #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{amount}, #{status}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, request_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount, status, created_at, expired_at, accepted_at FROM remittance_status_history WHERE sender_id = #{senderId}
